alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 10:39PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. In Colorado, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide and Northwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...Through 11 AM MST Thursday. Greatest impacts are expected through tomorrow morning, and again Tuesday night through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will become extremely hazardous due to near whiteout conditions in periods of heavy snow and blowing snow. Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways and significant drifting snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
